content.text:
# 3 February 1888 Newtown colonial by-election

A by-election was held for the New South Wales Legislative Assembly electorate of Newtown on 3 February 1888 because of the death of Frederick Gibbes ().
Dates
{| class="wikitable"
! Date !! Event
|-
| 17 January 1888
| Death of Frederick Gibbes.
|-
| 23 January 1888
| Writ of election issued by the Speaker of the Legislative Assembly.
|-
| 31 January 1888
| Nominations
|-
| 3 February 1888
| Polling day
|-
| 7 February 1888
| Return of writ
|}
Results
}}
Frederick Gibbes () died.
